'''1.20.12''' is a hotfix to ''[[Bedrock Edition]]'' released on July 18, 2023, which fixes bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/17690571678605-Minecraft-1-20-12-Bedrock-|title=Minecraft - 1.20.12 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=July 18, 2023}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.20.12 Hotfix|otherissuescount=3
}}
'''Other'''
* Fixed resource pack crashes with launch of 1.20.10.
* Fixed a crash that could occur on iOS and iPadOS.
* Fixed connection stability related to "Abandoned connection closed" errors.
